card1.title: Loucura Amor - Your Telemessage Website
card1.description: Demonstrate all your love through words that touch the heart, we dedicate ourselves to expressing deep feelings. Our messages capture the essence of love. Surprise and enchant those you love, bringing the love of words to life. The Loucura Amor website was developed as a means of promoting thousands of audio messages.

card2.title: DIY Crypto - Bitcoin Offline Protection with Web3 Security
card2.description: DIY Crypto is an innovative platform that offers a practical approach to protecting your bitcoins offline, using advanced Web3 security concepts. This project combines the simplicity of ReactJS and the robustness of Node.js to create a smooth and secure user experience. By using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, the application not only ensures an attractive visual interface but also maintains a clean architecture and well-structured code, promoting maintainability and scalability. Learn how to keep your digital assets safe and explore best practices for self-custody in this dynamic learning environment.

card3.title: HastyDEV - A Platform for Developers by Developers
card3.description: HastyDEV is a platform designed to simplify and facilitate collaboration between developers, Microentrepreneurs (MEIs), and Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) in the software development market. This platform offers unique opportunities for all involved, becoming a convergence center to create technological solutions, promote portfolio growth, and encourage participation through a gamified system.

card4.description: Voluntary project, where the layout was edited and redesigned voluntarily.
